name: Matterqus Sample
description: Disqus monitor and notification sender to Mattermost

MATTERQUS_DISQUS_FORUM.description: Disqus forum(s) to check, specified by shortname, comma separated.

MATTERQUS_MATTERMOST_WEBHOOK.description: URL of your Incoming WebHook in Mattermost.

MATTERQUS_INTERVAL.description: Number of seconds between each check (default 60).

MATTERQUS_DISQUS_LIMIT.description: The number of recent comments to check (default 25, max 100).

MATTERQUS_MATTERMOST_MENTION.description: Users in Mattermost channel to mention when notification arrives, comma separated.
